deliverables: 2 Instagram Reels featuring Coleman sleeping bags
1 TikTok video showing cold-weather skoolie camping setup
notes: First real brand deal. They reached out after the viral skoolie winter insulation video. Performance was solid - Reels got 42K combined views. Rachel said they'd consider working together again for spring campaign.

deliverables: 1 Instagram Reel about favorite Thousand Trails campground
2 Instagram Stories with membership promo code ALSOKAL15
notes: They provided a free annual membership as part of the deal. 23 redemptions on the promo code. Good relationship - they want to do a summer series if our following keeps growing.

campaignName: GoSun Sport Solar Oven - Vanlife Cooking
deliverables: 1 TikTok video demonstrating solar oven cooking on the road
1 Instagram Reel with recipe using GoSun Sport
Affiliate link in bio for 30 days
notes: TikTok video posted Feb 3, performing above average. Still need to film the Instagram Reel - planning to do the campfire mac & cheese recipe with solar oven twist. They sent the product for free. 10% affiliate commission on top of flat fee.

deliverables: Instagram Story series (3 frames) showing daily off-grid power usage
YouTube long-form integration (2-3 min segment) in skoolie tour/day-in-the-life video
notes: Best paying deal yet. They want authentic off-grid content showing how we power the skoolie. Instagram Stories due this week, YouTube integration planned for the full skoolie tour video we're filming in late Feb. Product provided plus $850 flat.

deliverables: 3 Instagram Reels per month featuring REI gear
notes: Sent pitch deck and media kit on Feb 6. This would be a game-changer - $3K for a 3-month ambassador deal. They found us through the Coleman collab. Jen said they're reviewing Q2 creator budgets and will get back by end of Feb. Fingers crossed.

deliverables: 2 Instagram Reels at Harvest Hosts locations
notes: Tom DMed us on Instagram asking if we'd be interested in a trade deal - free annual membership for content. Considering it since we already use Harvest Hosts. Need to counter-pitch for a paid component on top of the membership. Worth at minimum $300-500 in cash plus the membership ($99 value).
